input.sentences: my teenage sons are very into both basketball and cycling .
the organization organization festival celebrates both of their obsessions .
they put on their basketball shirts and cycled down to it .
they met some friends there | and were thrilled to be there .
the big organization organization arch was like a arch to wonderland for them | almost .
output.sentences: My teenage sons were preparing for a nighttime cycling trip.
They organized around the bike, obsessing over how they would make it to the festival on time.
Wearing matching shirts, two of them cycled from their basketball game.
They were thrilled when they met their friends at the festival
The festival proved to be a wonderland, well organized, with a towering Red Bull arch.
